```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(colortable)
library(pagedtable)

pagedtable(mtcars, shadowDOM = TRUE)

mtcars2 <- mtcars
mtcars2$mpg <- color_vctr(mtcars2$mpg, text_color = color_scale("Blues"))
pagedtable(mtcars2, pagerows = 10)

```
